title: Introducing: Conditioner
body:
There’s nothing better than when a new artist arrives with a pretty much fully realised sound.

LA duo **Conditioner** showcase a distinctively catchy vibe on their two debut tracks, the upbeat _That’s Not Me_ and the more melancholic _Under Water_. A nod to a track lifted from Beach Boys’ Pet Sounds, it’s an influence that is worn on their sleeves – simple chords, coherent song structures and a knack for finding a killer hook. There’s more than enough here to suggest a very bright future for Conditioner.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
